physical_appearance: A Second World War bayonet frog used by the British army is displayed. It is khaki in colour. At the right hand side of the middle of the image, a button is visible on the sheath. There is a slight tear on the bayonet frog. The stitching on the sheath can be seen running around its perimeter, as well as towards the middle.
sgcool_label_text: This was standard issue of the British Army during WWII, which soldiers carried to sheath their bayonets.
subject_terms_2: World War, 1939 - 1945 Great Britain. Army Bayonets Scabbards
